name: @joingo/vuery
description: 面向 Ruoyi 服务框架开发的 Vue3 应用程序脚手架。
author: Wang Yucai <netowls-studio@outlook.com>

scripts.version:patch: pnpm --filter ./packages/** run version:patch && pnpm --filter ./applications/** run version:patch
scripts.version:minor: pnpm --filter ./packages/** run version:minor && pnpm --filter ./applications/** run version:minor
scripts.version:major: pnpm --filter ./packages/** run version:major && pnpm --filter ./applications/** run version:major
